attributes.action: Have a new general election when he retires from office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is not right that the country has a new prime minister forced on them by the Labour Party having an internal election which is a "closed shop". The whole country should be allowed to vote on this issue.
Mr Blair should be forced to dissolve parliament before he goes and allow a clean break from his leadership.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
